vsParam:
We've arrived at Ruhuna Village!
But...

What's going on?! Monsters have flooded this place!
Where did they come from?!

They may barge into the village anytime!
We have got to figure out a way!

B-but how could we deal with so many monsters?
We can't defeat them with a frontal attack!

You're right... If we can't wipe out all of them, let's
just try to stop them from intruding into the village, OK?

Let's go ask Bilberry for information
before working out a plan.

Yeah, maybe we can find out why there are
so many monsters here from Bilberry!

Yeah. [px], please make items that could
ward the monsters off!
OK! Let's start with making items, [px]!
